alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 20 at 1:08PM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected, with locally higher possible immediately downwind of the Mogollon Rim. * WHERE...Mogollon Rim and Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected to occur during the afternoon and evening on Monday. Winds are then expected subside briefly overnight before increasing again late Tuesday morning and into the afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
